p: Chlorophyll content was determined as described in [ 30]. In brief, 0.5 g of fresh sample were homogenized with 5 mL dimethyl formamide and kept in the dark in the refrigerator for 48 h. The absorbance was then measured at 470, 647 and 663 nm with a spectrophotometer (model UV-2401 PC, International Equipment Trading LTD. (IET), Milano, Italia).
